passives.name: Support Quest
passives.effects: Earn {{g|800}} through ''Shared Riches'' and this item's {{stil|gold generation}} stat to automatically upgrade to {{ii|Bounty of Worlds}}, increasing the ''Ward'' active to instead have 4 wards in stock.

passives.name: Shared Riches
passives.effects:
Grants a '''Shared Riches''' charge every 20 seconds, up to 3 charges. When an allied champion is within {{tip|er|icononly=true}} 1050 units of you, consume a charge in the following ways:
• Kill a minion by any means, granting you {{g|20}} and the nearest allied champion kill {{g|gold}}. Damaging a minion {{as|'''below''' {{rd|50%|30%}} of its '''maximum''' health}} with a [[basic attack]] will {{tip|execute}} it, if any charges are available.
• Damage an enemy champion or structure with a basic attack or ability, granting you {{g|{{rd|24|22}}}}. A charge may be consumed this way only once per attack or ability.
Receives diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.

active.name: Ward
active.effects: Consumes a charge to place a {{tip|Stealth Ward}} at the target location, which grants {{tip|sight}} of the surrounding area. '''Warding''' charges refill upon visiting the shop.
